<!-- generated_at: 2026-02-19T10:08:28Z -->
# Platform: Flutter

## /
- [Readme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/README.md): Developer-facing README providing installation, configuration, and usage guidance for the Clix Flutter SDK, including initialization via `Clix.initialize`, user management APIs, Firebase-based push notification integration, platform setup steps, error handling, and sample app references.
- [Changelog](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/CHANGELOG.md): Changelog documenting semver release history and notable SDK changes (init/APIs, push notification handlers, session tracking, MMKV storage migration, reset()/user-ID, API client User-Agent, platform requirements), serving as authoritative release notes for developers.
- [License](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/LICENSE): Defines the project’s modified MIT-style license, granting standard use/modify/distribute rights while restricting all substantial use to Clix-provided services and disallowing repurposing for unrelated platforms without explicit permission.

## android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/ClixPlugin.kt): Defines the Android entry-point Flutter plugin (`ClixPlugin`) that implements `FlutterPlugin` and `ClixHostApi`, wiring the generated host API via `ClixHostApi.setUp` to the engine’s `binaryMessenger` on attachment and (erroneously) re-setup on detachment.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/Messages.g.kt): Autogenerated Pigeon bridge defining the `ClixHostApi` host interface, its custom `MessagesPigeonCodec`, FlutterError wrapping utilities, and the `setUp` entry point for wiring Android-side message handlers to Flutter via a `BinaryMessenger`.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/ClixPlugin.kt): Defines the Android entry-point Flutter plugin (`ClixPlugin`) that implements `FlutterPlugin` and `ClixHostApi`, wiring the generated host API via `ClixHostApi.setUp` to the engine’s `binaryMessenger` on attachment and (erroneously) re-setup on detachment.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/android/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/Messages.g.kt): Autogenerated Pigeon bridge defining the `ClixHostApi` host interface, its custom `MessagesPigeonCodec`, FlutterError wrapping utilities, and the `setUp` entry point for wiring Android-side message handlers to Flutter via a `BinaryMessenger`.

## ios/Classes
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/Messages.g.swift): Autogenerated Pigeon Swift bindings defining the `ClixHostApi` host protocol, custom `PigeonError` and message codec (`MessagesPigeonCodec`), plus the `ClixHostApiSetup.setUp` entry point for wiring Flutter platform channels on iOS/macOS.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/ClixPlugin.swift): Defines the iOS entrypoint for the Clix Flutter SDK, registering the `ClixHostApi` over the plugin registrar’s `binaryMessenger` and wiring an `UIApplicationDelegate` to handle (currently no-op) remote notification registration callbacks.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/Messages.g.swift): Autogenerated Pigeon Swift bindings defining the `ClixHostApi` host protocol, custom `PigeonError` and message codec (`MessagesPigeonCodec`), plus the `ClixHostApiSetup.setUp` entry point for wiring Flutter platform channels on iOS/macOS.
- [Clixplugin](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/ios/Classes/ClixPlugin.swift): Defines the iOS entrypoint for the Clix Flutter SDK, registering the `ClixHostApi` over the plugin registrar’s `binaryMessenger` and wiring an `UIApplicationDelegate` to handle (currently no-op) remote notification registration callbacks.

## lib
- [Clix Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/clix_flutter.dart): Primary library entrypoint that re-exports core Clix SDK configuration/runtime (`clix.dart`, `clix_config.
- [Clix Flutter](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/clix_flutter.dart): Primary library entrypoint that re-exports core Clix SDK configuration/runtime (`clix.dart`, `clix_config.

## lib/src/core
- [Clix Config.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.g.dart): Generated JSON (de)serializers for ClixConfig: _$ClixConfigFromJson and _$ClixConfigToJson map fields (including extra_headers), apply defaults (endpoint, logLevel, sessionTimeoutMs), and convert ClixLogLevel via _$ClixLogLevelEnumMap; part of clix_config.dart.
- [Clix Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_version.dart): Provides a lazily-resolved, cached SDK version string via `ClixVersion.version`, using `package_info_plus`’s `PackageInfo.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix.dart): Clix is the SDK singleton facade that initializes/configures StorageService, ClixAPIClient, Token/Device/Event/Session/Notification services (persisting ClixConfig), starts sessions, exposes static APIs—initialize(ClixConfig), Notification, setUserId/reset/setUserProperty(s)/getDeviceId/trackEvent/setLogLevel/isInitialized—while wrapping errors.
- [Clix Notification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_notification.dart): Manages push notifications (FirebaseMessaging) for Clix: exposes configure, requestPermission, getPermissionStatus, setPermissionGranted (syncs to server), getToken, deleteToken and handler registration (onMessage/onBackgroundMessage/onNotificationOpened/onFcmTokenError), with init gating and error logging.
- [Clix Config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.dart): Defines an immutable ClixConfig containing projectId, apiKey, endpoint (default https://api.clix.
- [Clix Config.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.g.dart): Generated JSON (de)serializers for ClixConfig: _$ClixConfigFromJson and _$ClixConfigToJson map fields (including extra_headers), apply defaults (endpoint, logLevel, sessionTimeoutMs), and convert ClixLogLevel via _$ClixLogLevelEnumMap; part of clix_config.dart.
- [Clix Version](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_version.dart): Provides a lazily-resolved, cached SDK version string via `ClixVersion.version`, using `package_info_plus`’s `PackageInfo.
- [Clix](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix.dart): Clix is the SDK singleton facade that initializes/configures StorageService, ClixAPIClient, Token/Device/Event/Session/Notification services (persisting ClixConfig), starts sessions, exposes static APIs—initialize(ClixConfig), Notification, setUserId/reset/setUserProperty(s)/getDeviceId/trackEvent/setLogLevel/isInitialized—while wrapping errors.
- [Clix Notification](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_notification.dart): ClixNotification manages push notification lifecycle and handlers in the Clix SDK—wrapping FirebaseMessaging via Clix services to request/get permissions, sync server push permission, fetch/delete FCM tokens, toggle autoHandleLandingURL, and register onMessage/onBackgroundMessage/onNotificationOpened/onFcmTokenError callbacks while logging errors.
- [Clix Config](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/core/clix_config.dart): Defines an immutable ClixConfig containing projectId, apiKey, endpoint (default https://api.clix.

## lib/src/models
- [Clix Push Notification Payload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.dart): Defines the `ClixPushNotificationPayload` JSON-serializable model for push message metadata (IDs, URLs, custom properties), providing `fromJson`/`toJson` via `json_serializable` and value semantics where equality and hashing are based solely on `messageId`.
- [Clix Device.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.g.dart): Generated JSON (de)serialization helpers for `ClixDevice`, mapping device/app/sdk metadata fields (e.g.
- [Clix User Property.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.g.dart): Generated JSON serialization helpers for `ClixUserProperty`, providing `_$ClixUserPropertyFromJson`/`_$ClixUserPropertyToJson` and the `PropertyType` ↔ string enum map used by `json_serializable` when encoding/decoding user property payloads.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.g.dart): Generated json_serializable helpers that construct `ClixPushNotificationPayload` from a raw `Map` and serialize it back to JSON, mapping message, campaign, user, device, tracking, landing/image URLs, and arbitrary `custom_properties` for push notification handling.
- [Clix Device](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.dart): Defines the `ClixDevice` JSON-serializable model encapsulating device, OS, locale, app, SDK, and push-notification metadata, with `fromJson`, `toJson`, and `copyWith` helpers, and identity/equality based solely on the `id` field (via json_serializable codegen in `clix_device.g.
- [Clix User Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.dart): Defines the `ClixUserProperty` model and `PropertyType` enum, including a typed factory (`of`) that infers property type from Dart values, JSON serialization via `json_serializable`, and value-based equality/hashCode for user property payloads.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.dart): Defines the `ClixPushNotificationPayload` JSON-serializable model for push message metadata (IDs, URLs, custom properties), providing `fromJson`/`toJson` via `json_serializable` and value semantics where equality and hashing are based solely on `messageId`.
- [Clix Device.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.g.dart): Generated JSON (de)serialization helpers for `ClixDevice`, mapping device/app/sdk metadata fields (e.g.
- [Clix User Property.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.g.dart): Generated JSON serialization helpers for `ClixUserProperty`, providing `_$ClixUserPropertyFromJson`/`_$ClixUserPropertyToJson` and the `PropertyType` ↔ string enum map used by `json_serializable` when encoding/decoding user property payloads.
- [Clix Push Notification Payload.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_push_notification_payload.g.dart): Generated json_serializable helpers that construct `ClixPushNotificationPayload` from a raw `Map` and serialize it back to JSON, mapping message, campaign, user, device, tracking, landing/image URLs, and arbitrary `custom_properties` for push notification handling.
- [Clix Device](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_device.dart): Defines the `ClixDevice` JSON-serializable model encapsulating device, OS, locale, app, SDK, and push-notification metadata, with `fromJson`, `toJson`, and `copyWith` helpers, and identity/equality based solely on the `id` field (via json_serializable codegen in `clix_device.g.
- [Clix User Property](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/models/clix_user_property.dart): Defines the `ClixUserProperty` model and `PropertyType` enum, including a typed factory (`of`) that infers property type from Dart values, JSON serialization via `json_serializable`, and value-based equality/hashCode for user property payloads.

## lib/src/platform
- [Clix Native Bridge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/clix_native_bridge.dart): ClixNativeBridge implements the generated ClixFlutterApi to receive native onNotificationTapped callbacks, normalize and JSON-decode 'clix'/'payload' entries into a Map, delegate to NotificationService.handleNotificationTap, and log errors via ClixLogger.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/messages.g.dart): Autogenerated Pigeon message definitions for the Flutter–host bridge, providing a custom `_PigeonCodec` (int handling) and the `ClixHostApi` entry point that configures the `BinaryMessenger` and channel name suffix for platform message channels.
- [Clix Native Bridge](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/clix_native_bridge.dart): Implements ClixFlutterApi's onNotificationTapped to receive native-initiated notification taps, deserialize 'clix' or 'payload' JSON fields into Map<String,dynamic>, and forward to NotificationService.handleNotificationTap while logging errors via ClixLogger.
- [Messages.g](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/platform/messages.g.dart): Autogenerated Pigeon message definitions for the Flutter–host bridge, providing a custom `_PigeonCodec` (int handling) and the `ClixHostApi` entry point that configures the `BinaryMessenger` and channel name suffix for platform message channels.

## lib/src/services
- [Session Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/session_service.dart): SessionService (WidgetsBindingObserver) manages app session lifecycle by persisting last-activity to StorageService, adding lifecycle observers, emitting SESSION_START via EventService (optionally with pending messageId) on new sessions (min 5s timeout), and exposes start(), setPendingMessageId(), cleanup().
- [Clix Api Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/clix_api_client.dart): HTTP client wrapper that builds `/api/v1` URIs from `ClixConfig`, injects versioned common headers (project ID, API key, extra headers, User-Agent), logs requests/responses, and exposes `get`, `post`, `put`, `delete`, and `close` methods using `package:http`.
- [Token Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/token_service.dart): Manages push token lifecycle using `StorageService`, providing retrieval (`getCurrentToken`, `getPreviousTokens`), persistence with deduped/limited history (`saveToken`), conversion from byte device tokens (`convertTokenToString`), and full cleanup/reset (`clearTokens`, `reset`) with `ClixLogger` error/debug logging.
- [Event Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_api_service.dart): EventAPIService uses ClixAPIClient to POST event payloads (including event_property.custom_properties and optional message_id/source_type) to '/events' via trackEvent(deviceId,name,properties,{messageId,sourceType}), logs with ClixLogger, validates 2xx and rethrows on errors.
- [Device Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_service.dart): Manages device identity and metadata, mapping local storage, token management, and platform/app info into `ClixDevice` models and delegating to `DeviceAPIService` to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove user properties and push tokens.
- [Notification Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/notification_service.dart): Singleton NotificationService managing Firebase Messaging and flutter_local_notifications integration: initialize(), requestNotificationPermission(), token lifecycle (getCurrentToken/deleteToken), topic subscribe/unsubscribe, local/background notification display and URL navigation, plus push event tracking via Device/Token/Event/Storage services.
- [Event Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_service.dart): EventService exposes trackEvent(name, properties, messageId, sourceType): fetches deviceId via DeviceService, strips null property values, calls EventAPIService.trackEvent, logs via ClixLogger, and rethrows exceptions on failure.
- [Storage Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/storage_service.dart): JSON-backed key–value storage abstraction over `SharedPreferences` that lazily initializes preferences, logs lifecycle events via `ClixLogger`, transparently migrates legacy string values, and exposes generic `set<T>`, `get<T>`, and `remove` APIs for SDK data persistence.
- [Device Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_api_service.dart): Defines `DeviceAPIService`, a wrapper around `ClixAPIClient` that logs and performs HTTP POST/DELETE calls to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove `ClixUserProperty` values for a given device, throwing on non-2xx responses.
- [Clix Api Client](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/clix_api_client.dart): HTTP client wrapper that builds `/api/v1` URIs from `ClixConfig`, injects versioned common headers (project ID, API key, extra headers, User-Agent), logs requests/responses, and exposes `get`, `post`, `put`, `delete`, and `close` methods using `package:http`.
- [Token Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/token_service.dart): Manages push token lifecycle using `StorageService`, providing retrieval (`getCurrentToken`, `getPreviousTokens`), persistence with deduped/limited history (`saveToken`), conversion from byte device tokens (`convertTokenToString`), and full cleanup/reset (`clearTokens`, `reset`) with `ClixLogger` error/debug logging.
- [Event Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_api_service.dart): EventAPIService uses ClixAPIClient to POST event payloads (including event_property.custom_properties and optional message_id/source_type) to '/events' via trackEvent(deviceId,name,properties,{messageId,sourceType}), logs with ClixLogger, validates 2xx and rethrows on errors.
- [Device Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_service.dart): Manages device identity and metadata, mapping local storage, token management, and platform/app info into `ClixDevice` models and delegating to `DeviceAPIService` to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove user properties and push tokens.
- [Notification Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/notification_service.dart): Singleton NotificationService managing Firebase Messaging and flutter_local_notifications integration: initialize(), requestNotificationPermission(), token lifecycle (getCurrentToken/deleteToken), topic subscribe/unsubscribe, local/background notification display and URL navigation, plus push event tracking via Device/Token/Event/Storage services.
- [Event Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/event_service.dart): EventService exposes trackEvent(name, properties, messageId, sourceType): fetches deviceId via DeviceService, strips null property values, calls EventAPIService.trackEvent, logs via ClixLogger, and rethrows exceptions on failure.
- [Storage Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/storage_service.dart): JSON-backed key–value storage abstraction over `SharedPreferences` that lazily initializes preferences, logs lifecycle events via `ClixLogger`, transparently migrates legacy string values, and exposes generic `set<T>`, `get<T>`, and `remove` APIs for SDK data persistence.
- [Device Api Service](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/services/device_api_service.dart): Defines `DeviceAPIService`, a wrapper around `ClixAPIClient` that logs and performs HTTP POST/DELETE calls to register devices, bind/unbind project user IDs, and upsert/remove `ClixUserProperty` values for a given device, throwing on non-2xx responses.

## lib/src/utils
- [Clix Error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/clix_error.dart): Defines the `ClixError` exception enum and `ClixErrorWithCause` wrapper used across the SDK for standardized initialization/configuration/network/encoding/decoding error reporting, including helper constructors (`networkError`, `decodingError`, `unknownErrorWithReason`) and value-based equality for cause-aware errors.
- [Clix Error](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/clix_error.dart): Defines the `ClixError` exception enum and `ClixErrorWithCause` wrapper used across the SDK for standardized initialization/configuration/network/encoding/decoding error reporting, including helper constructors (`networkError`, `decodingError`, `unknownErrorWithReason`) and value-based equality for cause-aware errors.

## lib/src/utils/logging
- [Clix Logger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_logger.dart): Implements the SDK’s centralized logging utility, mapping `ClixLogLevel`-filtered messages to `dart:developer.log` with timestamps and optional errors, and exposing `setLogLevel`, `log`, and convenience methods (`debug`, `info`, `warn`, `error`) as primary logging entry points.
- [Clix Log Level](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_log_level.dart): Defines the `ClixLogLevel` enum with numeric severity values, comparison operators, and a `shouldLog` helper to determine if messages at a given log level should be emitted based on the current threshold.
- [Clix Logger](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_logger.dart): Implements the SDK’s centralized logging utility, mapping `ClixLogLevel`-filtered messages to `dart:developer.log` with timestamps and optional errors, and exposing `setLogLevel`, `log`, and convenience methods (`debug`, `info`, `warn`, `error`) as primary logging entry points.
- [Clix Log Level](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/lib/src/utils/logging/clix_log_level.dart): Defines the `ClixLogLevel` enum with numeric severity values, comparison operators, and a `shouldLog` helper to determine if messages at a given log level should be emitted based on the current threshold.

## pigeons
- [Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/pigeons/messages.dart): Pigeon configuration file defining the `ClixHostApi` host-side platform channel interface and generating strongly typed Dart (`messages.g.
- [Messages](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/pigeons/messages.dart): Pigeon configuration file defining the `ClixHostApi` host-side platform channel interface and generating strongly typed Dart (`messages.g.

## samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android entrypoint for the basic Flutter sample app, extending `FlutterActivity` as the host activity that boots the Flutter engine and renders the Dart UI with no additional native logic or custom platform integrations.
- [Mainactivity](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/android/app/src/main/kotlin/so/clix/samples/basic/MainActivity.kt): Android entrypoint for the basic Flutter sample app, extending `FlutterActivity` as the host activity that boots the Flutter engine and renders the Dart UI with no additional native logic or custom platform integrations.

## samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): iOS Notification Service Extension entry point subclassing `ClixNotificationServiceExtension` to enable Clix Flutter SDK rich push notifications (image downloads, payload processing, analytics) and log lifecycle events in `didReceive` and `serviceExtensionTimeWillExpire`.
- [Notificationservice](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/ClixNotificationExtension/NotificationService.swift): iOS Notification Service Extension entry point subclassing `ClixNotificationServiceExtension` to enable Clix Flutter SDK rich push notifications (image downloads, payload processing, analytics) and log lifecycle events in `didReceive` and `serviceExtensionTimeWillExpire`.

## samples/basic_app/ios/Runner
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS entry-point `AppDelegate` that initializes Firebase (`FirebaseApp.configure()`), registers Flutter plugins via `GeneratedPluginRegistrant.
- [Appdelegate](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/Runner/AppDelegate.swift): iOS entry-point `AppDelegate` that initializes Firebase (`FirebaseApp.configure()`), registers Flutter plugins via `GeneratedPluginRegistrant.

## samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): Defines a placeholder `XCTestCase` (`RunnerTests`) for the iOS host app, intended for adding XCTest-based integration/unit tests around Flutter-Runner interactions without exposing any public APIs yet.
- [Runnertests](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/ios/RunnerTests/RunnerTests.swift): Defines a placeholder `XCTestCase` (`RunnerTests`) for the iOS host app, intended for adding XCTest-based integration/unit tests around Flutter-Runner interactions without exposing any public APIs yet.

## samples/basic_app/lib
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/main.dart): Entry point for the basic sample app that initializes Firebase and `Clix` (`Clix.initialize`), then builds a themed UI to display project/device info and demonstrate `Clix.
- [App State](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/app_state.dart): Singleton AppState (extends ChangeNotifier) provides app-wide getters for projectId, apiKey, deviceId, fcmToken and updateConfiguration/updateDeviceId/updateFCMToken methods which log via debugPrint and call notifyListeners to propagate state changes.
- [App Theme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/app_theme.dart): Provides AppTheme with static color constants and a Material3 dark ThemeData (theme getter) using Flutter's material package, configuring ColorScheme, scaffoldBackgroundColor, and textTheme for the sample app—purely declarative, no runtime side effects.
- [Content View](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/content_view.dart): ContentView StatefulWidget UI for the sample app exposing inputs to call the Clix SDK (Clix.getDeviceId, Notification.
- [Clix Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/clix_configuration.dart): Provides a singleton ClixConfig loader that reads assets/clix_config.json (via rootBundle), decodes it into a ClixConfig (projectId, apiKey, endpoint, extraHeaders), exposes static initialize() (idempotent) and config getter (throws StateError if uninitialized), and depends on clix_flutter and flutter/services.
- [Main](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/main.dart): Entry point for the basic sample app that initializes Firebase and `Clix` (`Clix.initialize`), then builds a themed UI to display project/device info and demonstrate `Clix.
- [App State](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/app_state.dart): Singleton AppState (extends ChangeNotifier) provides app-wide projectId/apiKey/deviceId/fcmToken state with getters and mutating methods—updateConfiguration, updateDeviceId, updateFCMToken—that debugPrint changes and call notifyListeners; depends on package:flutter/foundation.dart, initializing with 'Loading.
- [App Theme](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/app_theme.dart): Defines AppTheme (depends on flutter/material.dart) exposing static color constants and a ThemeData getter AppTheme.
- [Content View](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/content_view.dart): ContentView: a StatefulWidget UI that loads device/FCM IDs, persists userId to BasicApplication.sharedPreferences, and exposes form-driven flows (setUserId, setUserProperty, trackEvent—parses JSON event params) calling clix_flutter's Clix APIs and showing alerts; depends on AppState and AppTheme.
- [Clix Configuration](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/clix-so/clix-flutter-sdk/main/samples/basic_app/lib/clix_configuration.dart): Provides a singleton ClixConfig for the sample app by loading assets/clix_config.
